column1: In response to Rumpole's comments, yes all non essential travel may be stopped but not ALL travel insurance policies will cover you for cancellation. People should carefuly check the "General Exclusions" in their policy wording as some policies do not oprovide cover for "Epidemics or pandemics."
What thread was this mentioned in?
It was an old post from May, think it was titled Swine Flu Alert.
